test.name: Verify Text on DUT using Appium

kw.name: Verify Text Appium Full

kw.doc: Verifies FULL visible text using Appium (exact match). Fails if only partial text is found.

kw.name: Tap By Coordinates
kw.doc: Tap on screen using X,Y coordinates from JSON key using Appium (mobile: tap).

kw.name: Tap By Text
kw.doc: Tap on visible text using OCR and Appium clickGesture. Works without XML / UI dump.
